description: It does one thing, and it does well with nice little options.
The only thing this does is crop an image and it does it simply. That is exactly what I'm looking for.
This is an excellent app for cropping and previewing social media graphics, profile pictures, header images etc. Has features and affordance I didn't even realise I would need.

This is going to be a good tool for my Linux desktop toolbox -- cropping/resizing images is a pretty common task in today's online world, and is often missing or difficult to figure out in general-purpose image viewers and editors.

I really like the clean look of the UI and the simple workflow.
summary: Does one thing, and does it well!

description: What a terrific little program! Very easy to use with really useful features.
Does what it's supposed to in a simple and intuitive way without getting in the way.
